document.full_text: twitter revelations of alleged attempts by british celebrities to cover up sexual indiscretions show that "super injunctions" to gag the press are unsustainable, lawyers said monday.
document.title: twitter outings undermine "super injunctions"
lines_and_colors: twitter revelations of alleged attempts by british celebrities to cover up sexual indiscretions show that "super injunctions" to gag the press are unsustainable, lawyers said monday.
